Sequencing Technology Codes¶

author:Juan Medina
contact:medinaj@mskcc.org
organization:Memorial Sloan-Kettering
status:This is “work in progress”
date:2015-12-03
version:0.1
abstract:This dictionary is used to map the different sequencing technologies and technology types to the codes used in the Leukgen environment. 
{
    "DNA": {
            "ATAC-SEQ": {
                    "DEFAULT": "10A",
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "DEFAULT"
            },
            "CHIP-SEQ": {
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "H3K4ME1",
                    "H3K27AC": "6D",
                    "H3K4ME1": "6A",
                    "H3K4ME2": "6C",
                    "H3K4ME3": "6B"
            },
            "FOUNDATION": {
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "FOUNDATIONON-HEME-PANEL",
                    "FOUNDATIONON-HEME-PANEL": "12A",
                    "FOUNDATIONON-PANEL": "12B"
            },
            "TARGETED-DNA": {
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "HEMEPACT-V1",
                    "HEMEPACT-V1": "4A",
                    "HEMEPACT-V2": "4B",
                    "HEMEPACT-V3": "4C",
                    "IMPACT-300": "5A",
                    "IMPACT-340": "5B",
                    "IMPACT-CLINICAL": "5C",
                    "IMPACT-HEME": "4D"
            },
            "WHOLE-EXOME": {
                    "AGILENT-50MB": "2A",
                    "AGILENT-51MB": "2B",
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "AGILENT-50MB"
            },
            "WHOLE-GENOME": {
                    "DEFAULT": "1A",
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "DEFAULT"
            }
    },
    "RNA": {
            "RNA-SEQ": {
                    "3'END": "3B",
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "FULLTRANSCRIPT",
                    "FULLTRANSCRIPT": "3A"
            },
            "RNA-SEQ-CUSTOM": {
                    "DEFAULT": "9A",
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "DEFAULT"
            },
            "RNA-SEQ-SINGLE-CELL": {
                    "DEFAULT": "10A",
                    "DEFAULT_TECHNOLOGY": "DEFAULT"
            }
    }
}
